name: sslin
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c2, c0), cin(c2, c1)))

stmt.origin: 3sstr4g(cin(c2, c0), cin(c2, c1), cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, c2), wss(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c2, c0), cin(c2, c1)))
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cin(c2, c0), cin(c0, c2))
-| wceq(cin(c2, c1), cin(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c2, c0), cin(c2, c1)))
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cin(c2, c0), cin(c0, c2))
-| wceq(cin(c2, c1), cin(c1, c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c2, c0), cin(c2, c1)))
-| wceq(cin(c2, c0), cin(c0, c2))
-| wceq(cin(c2, c1), cin(c1, c2))

|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c2, c0), cin(c2, c1)))
-| wceq(cin(c2, c1), cin(c1, c2))
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c2, c0), cin(c2, c1)))

comment: Add left intersection to subclass relation. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.)
